column2: "Na Abram nyaa no ho kɛsenara wɔ fiembowa
"Na otuu no kwan fi Pomu afamu araa kodur Bɛtɛl
column3: beebi mbrɛ ahyɛse no n’asesee wɔ mu no

column2: "beebi mbrɛ afɔrmbukyia a asɔpɔn no ɔyɛɛ no wɔ hɔ no wɔ no: na hɔ na Abram sɔɔr EWURADZE."
"Nna Lot a ɔnye Abram nam no so wɔ nguan
"Nna asaase no nnso hɔn dɛ wɔbɛtsena fakor: osiandɛ hɔn ahodze dɔɔ so
column3: ma dɛm ntsi wɔbɔ mu tsena a ɔnnyɛ yie."

column2: "Na aperper baa Abram no mbowahwɛfo nye Lot no mbowahwɛfo ntamu. Ber no nna Keenanfo nye Perizfo tsetse asaase no do."

column4: mma emma aperper mmba emi nye ɔwo ntamu
column5: na mo mbowahwɛfo nye wo mbowahwɛfo ntamu; osiandɛ yɛyɛ enuanom."

column2: "Ana nnyɛ asaase no nyinara na ɔda w’enyim yi bi? Meserɛ wo
column3: tsew woho fi mo ho: sɛ bankum na ebɛfa a
column4: ɔno mo so mobɔkɔ nyimfa; anaa sɛ nyimfa na ebɛfa a

column3: na ɔhwɛɛ Jordan Tɛtɛrmu nyinara dze rokɔ Zoar
column4: na ohun dɛ no do beebiara wɔ nsu papaapa. Iyi ekyir ansaana EWURADZE resɛɛ Sodom nye Gomora

column2: "Nna Lot faa Jordan Tɛtɛrmu nyinara; na Lot tui faa boka afamu: na ɔbaako paa noho fii ne nyɛnko ho."

column3: na Lot tsenaa Tɛtɛrmu kurow no mu
column4: na ɔdze n’asesee tutui araa dze kodur Sodom."

column2: "Afei Sodomfo yɛ ehuhufo nye ndzebɔnyɛfo kɛsenara tsia EWURADZE."
"Na Lot paa noho wɔ Abram ho n’ekyir no
column5: na fi beebi mbrɛ ewɔ no hwɛ kwaamu afamu nye pomu afamu nye boka afamu nye anee afamu:"

column2: "Na mebɛma w’asefo ayɛ dɛ asaase do huntuma: na sɛ obi tum kan asaase do huntuma a
column3: ɔnodze nna wobotum akan w’asefo no."
fa asaase no do wɔ ne tsentsen nye tɛtɛr mu; na ɔwo na medze bɛma wo."
na ɔbae bɛtsenaa Mamre nsudur a ɔwɔ Hebron no ne nkyɛn
column4: na osii afɔrmbukyia wɔ hɔ maa EWURADZE."
